meanings.definition: To have been joined or stuck together with superglue.
meanings.sent1: I superglued the broken pieces of my favorite mug back together.
meanings.sent2: She superglued the paper cutouts onto the poster for the school project.
meanings.sent3: The toy car superglued itself to the table, refusing to move.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was superglued by shared experiences and memories.
meanings.sent5: The idea of traveling the world superglued her mind, making it hard to focus on anything else.

meanings.sent1: I found a tube of superglued in the toolbox.
meanings.sent2: The superglued on the model airplane had dried up.
meanings.sent3: The superglued on the shelf was so old, it had turned yellow.
meanings.sent4: His fingers were covered in superglued after fixing the broken vase.
meanings.sent5: The superglued on the label made it difficult to read the instructions.
